Class LevelFrameUtils

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.utils.levels.LevelFrameUtils
public class LevelFrameUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling level frame interactions. This class provides methods to calculate the tile clicked based on the mouse coordinates.

  • Method Details

    • getTileClicked

      public static int[] getTileClicked(int x, int y, int[] appCanvasSize, int[] sceneSize, Level level)
      Calculates the tile clicked based on the mouse coordinates and the level size.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the mouse click.
      y - The y-coordinate of the mouse click.
      appCanvasSize - The size of the application canvas.
      sceneSize - The size of the scene.
      level - The level object.
      Returns:
      An array containing the x and y indices of the clicked tile, or {-1, -1} if outside bounds.
